name: ecommerce-api
description: this API impliments the CRUD for product inventory. It stores name and quantity of the product. it can create, delete, update and delete the product. [Video](youtube.com/wizzenalum) to show demo and setup. ## How to setup on local machine To use this repository your machine should have [node](https://nodejs.org/en/), npm, [monogodb](https://docs.mongodb.com/manual/installation/) and [git](https://git-scm.com/downloads).  1. check pre-requisits by these. ```go node --version npm --version git --version ``` 2. Now clone this repository ```go git clone https://github.com/wizzenalum/Ecommerce-API.git ``` 3. Change directory to Ecomerce-API ```go cd Ecommerce-API/ ```
author: ghanshyam
